title: Woman: Blond Hair

adjectives: Being or having light colored skin and hair and usually blue or grey eyes
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A light and yellowish, brownish or golden hair color.
A person with dark blond hair.
A person with fair skin and hair
Blond or blonde, or fair hair, is a hair color characterized by low levels of the dark pigment eumelanin.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman with blond hair emoji features a friendly and approachable persona, rendered with soft, rounded edges and a warm, inviting color palette. Her hair cascades in smooth, gently highlighted waves, showcasing Apple's meticulous attention to detail in texture and lighting. The subtle smile and pleasant expression, characteristic of Apple's character designs, make this emoji a versatile choice for representing women with this hair color in various contexts, from personal messages to professional communications.
